intro: Hebecarpa ovatifolia, commonly known as the broad-leafed hebecarpa, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa and is characterized by its broad, ovate leaves and showy, pinkish-white flowers. The fruit is small, capsule-like, and contains several seeds.
